name: Google Books
description: Created with React and using a MongoDB, this simple website allows the user to search for books and save choices for later.

name: User Directory
description: A user directory created using React. The data is stored in a JSON file.

name: Progressive Budget
description: A budget tracker. The data is stored in a MongoDB and in IndexedDB while offline.

name: Fitness Tracker
description: A website to track workout excercises. It stores the data in a MongoDB.

name: Eet Da Burger
description: A website that a list of burgers eaten and a wishlist of burgers to eat.

name: Employee Management System
description: A CLI application that saves information in a MySQL database.

name: Note Taker
description: A web aplication that allows a user to store notes. The notes are written to a JSON file.

name: Team Profile Generator
assignment: Object Oriented Programming and Test-Driven Development
description: A CLI application that asks a few questions about team members and generates an HTML page that shows information about the team

name: README Generator
description: A CLI application that asks a few questions about a project and generates a README file based on the answers.

name: Birdtopia
description: A website that uses geolocation and APIs to return information about birds in your area.

name: Weather Dashboard
description: Used AJAX to query a Weather API and return weather information to this page.

name: Day Planner
description: A day planner that uses jQuery and local storage.

name: Code Quiz
description: A code quiz that uses DOM manipulation.

name: Password Generator
description: An incredible password generator using Javascript that generates a random password of the desired length and complexity.

name: Responsive Portfolio
description: We created a portfolio page using the HTML, CSS and Bootstrap. I didn't have much to add at the time, so it was all personal interest and hobbies.

name: Code Refactor
description: Our first assignment. We were given HTML code and asked to refactor it to make it accessible.
